synopsis.text: Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, Hulk, and Spider-Man join forces with a group of young heroes in the thrilling anime, Marvel Disk Wars: The Avengers. When Loki orchestrates a cunning plan to scatter both villains and heroes across the globe using portable capturing devices called 'Disks,' chaos ensues. Fortunately, five brave youths gain the unique ability to restore these heroes through a program known as 'Biocode.' With the help of Spider-Man, who narrowly escapes being sealed himself, the young heroes obtain Disks containing the mighty Avengers. Now, they must work together to unleash their fighting skills and superhuman powers to thwart Loki's scheme for world domination. Aimed at boys aged 6-12, this action-packed adventure promises excitement and teamwork at every turn.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
